# Misc Exam Notes

## Plotting

**Basic Plot**
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("faraway")
data("seatpos")
y = seatpos$hipcenter
x = seatpos$Ht
```

```{r}
plot(x, y, col = "darkgrey", xlab = "X Label", ylab = "Y Label", main = "Title", bty = 'l', pch = 16)
```

**Plotting with a `grid`**

Use instead of `sort(x)`
```{r}
grid = seq(min(x), max(x), length.out = 250) 
```
